level.heading: Person entitled to file initial financing statement or continuation statement.
level.text: A person may file an initial financing statement or a continuation statement under this part if:
The secured party of record authorizes the filing; and "(b) The filing is necessary under this part:
To continue the effectiveness of a financing statement filed before the applicability date; or
To perfect or continue the perfection of a security interest.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Applicability of D.C. Law 19-669: Section 4 of D.C. Law 19-669 provided that the act shall apply as of July 1, 2013.
